meta.hint: A prefix can be added to the beginning of a  word to make a new word. eg. re+do = redo  A suffix can be added to the end of a word to make a new word. eg. help+ful = helpful  The prefix re- means again. The prefix un- means not or the opposite of. The suffix -ful means full of. The suffix -less means without.
meta.question: Complete the sentence with the right suffix.

content.description: The room was sound___. The room was without sound.
That painting is color___. That painting is so full of colors.
I like seed___ oranges. I like oranges without seed.
We must  __start the game. We must start the game again.
That girl was __kind to me. That girl was not kind to me.
